name: The Crow King
description:
After The King was dethroned from his kingdom, his soul was transferred to a Crow by an evil spell. Now a new king has been awakened to take back the Land.

You are the new Raven King. Your mission is to conquer the lost lands and take back your kingdom.

Create an impenetrable fortress, to protect your units and buildings.

Get resources and minerals to increase your army.

Explore the different lands and get treasures, secrets, and improvements for your tools.

Arm yourself with your sword and fight against all adversity until you can recover your kingdom and lead your army to victory! FOR THE CROW KING!

The Crow King Features:
● Simple and fast combat

● Different waves of enemies to fight

● Upgrade your fortress with defense towers and warrior creatures

● Create different buildings to increase the number of your army

● Explore and get resources to lead your army to victory and conquer the different lands
